website_summaries.verdict: Designed for high visibility in both daylight and darkness. If you're on the fence about sizing, be sure to go a size up.
pros: Waterproof with fluorescent yellow and black design
Features two-inch stripes of silver reflective tape
Warm polyester lining is quilted for comfort
Radio pocket and slash front pockets
cons: Elasticized sleeves make the fit too small for some

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you're freezing, it will keep you warm.
customer_reviews.text: Got this on sale for a steal of a deal! Even without the sale I will probably buy this again. Keep in mind it does not have a removable under-layer and will keep you very warm. Not recommended for the summer, but in the dead of winter up north, it will keep you toasty. Well constructed and grime resistant, it is a very nice jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great all weather jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I had some hesitations as to the "weather-proofness" of this jacket. But now that I have been out in the rain, cold and overall miserable sleet, i can say this jacket is pretty amazing. It is very waterproof. The fold out hood provided decent cover, as well as concealing perfectly in the collar. And best of all it is very warm. I actually have to make sure not to over do it with layers as the bonus feature of being waterproof also does a good job at insulating the air in. Very pleased with overall mobility and visibility at night.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W

customer_reviews.title: Buget friendly work wear. Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Good Jacket, needed a foul weather Jacket that could be beat up and ruined through a winter season. I considered this a throw away jacket for working outside this winter but it's held up well. Cuffs are slightly tight but, designed that way to keep crap from getting up there. Will probably last 3 seasons! Great for snow blowing the driveway. Kept me warm and protected from snow flying down the back with the hood. Great jacket for $40!!!
customer_reviews.author: electronTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Nice jacket!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you amazon!! I ordered 1 size larger, and it's a perfect fit. Really nice lightweight, waterproof high visibility jacket for construction. And the warehouse deal I got on it, can't be beat! A+++
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small, Get next size up
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made jacket. My husband is a size large but this large was too small, so we are going to return it for an exchange but want the XL instead. This jacket has a quilted liner that hopefully will keep him warm. Once we get the larger size jacket and he wears it a few times in the rain, I'll write another review about how waterproof it is.
customer_reviews.author: LISA K.

customer_reviews.title: True to Fit. Reflector Safety,
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for dog walking at night. I am 5'6" size 14 female and the Large fits fine but I dont expect to wear a bulky sweater under it or it will be a tight fit. The elastic cuff on one sleeve is tighter than the other. The craftsmanship seems to be the biggest problem with this item based on the reviews. But, since there were few choices for ladies jackets in this style, it suits my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Foster

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you dry and safe.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Paramedic in Wyoming, working traffic accidents on the highway can be cold AND dangerous. This jacket stands out well, day or night, and stops the unceasing Wyoming wind. I also ride a motorcycle, I rode ~110 miles through rain at 75-80 mph wearing this jacket. It kept me dry and warm. I can find only two things I'm disappointed in with this jacket: The liner is NOT removable and the sleeve cuffs are TOO tight. I can't pull the cuff over my wristwatch.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Doucette

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Warm, Durable, Affordable Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket, just what I was looking for. So far its durable, warm, and comfortable. It has plenty of pockets, most of which are on the inside of the jacket on both sides. I will update review if durability or quality changes. I work in a coal mine so this jacket will be tested in all areas of durability/quality. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Rob304

customer_reviews.title: Overall its pretty nice. Great in all elements
customer_reviews.text: Overall its pretty nice. Great in all elements. Keeps me warm. And dry. And also pretty good on windy days. I read reviews on the fitment. I am 5,5 155. And i have a large. I wear a t-shirt a long sleeve t-shirt and a hooded sweat shirt under this coat on cold days. And it fits well and i have good room and movement in it. When zipped all the way up and i stretch out for something it does like to creep up the back some. But not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: michael riordan

customer_reviews.title: not fun. This jacket is well made
customer_reviews.text: I got this after a fight with one of those ponchos while trying to change a tire in the middle of a down pour... not fun. This jacket is well made, super bright and has a hood. I keep this in my trunk with jumper cables, etc. Will buy one more to have in my other car just in case. Price pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: dc

customer_reviews.title: Rides up
customer_reviews.text: The fit is funky. It rides up a lot, can’t layer it over anything and my husband found it extremely uncomfortable. He ordered a L and it did not fit well. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Allenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: What a Bargain
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a work reflective work jacket, and with some kind of warmth to it. This worked like a charm. The one they were going to issue him from his job would have cost anywhere from $100 to $150. This worked and for much less. HIGHLY recommended.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great material
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this in December of last year (2015). He's used it every day and it is still going strong. The material is of great quality. I have washed it several of times and it's still all in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Naty

customer_reviews.title: Warm, visible and waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Very functional and great for the price, stitching on one pocket ripped after about a month, but that was a minor issue and I an re-stitch that easily.
customer_reviews.author: TomDavis

customer_reviews.title: My husband likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband, he finally had a chance to wear at nighttime walking the dog while raining (light rain). He said it's very warm and visible by the car. We haven't had chance to try it in the pouring rain yet. Up till now, my husband is very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Peace in SF

customer_reviews.title: GREAT jacket! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really sure what size I ordered, I think I followed someone's advice and maybe got one size up, but the jacket fits me perfectly, is extremely visible, and is 100% waterproof. The good is great when you have it up, or can it can also easily be hidden. It has a wonderful radio lapel loop, and zip-able pockets, overall a very great, and warm jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: It came extremely fast and it is made of great material. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for my husband for the rainy cold winter and he loves it. It is really think and keeps him warm during the really cold days. It came extremely fast and it is made of great material. Very sturdy! I would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Neely

customer_reviews.title: Love the jacket
customer_reviews.text: Thick and durable material, you stay dry in heavy rain fall and the colors stand out very well in dark places. - construction worker from Los Angeles, CA
customer_reviews.author: Pepe

customer_reviews.title: good material. good construction
customer_reviews.text: good material. good construction. however the hood is badly designed does not contour to a human head very well. its huge and covers have your face and eyes with no draw string to adjust the hood. overall the jacket is warm, water and wind resistant and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: TOW BOSS

customer_reviews.title: Very Good. ) Had never been worn
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine used ( description was Used , Very Good . ) Had never been worn . Likely purchased and returned . I am 6' and around 160 sleder build . Bought the large and glad I did . Don't think a medium would of worked . Class 3 reflective water / wind proof , lined and a roll up hood .
customer_reviews.author: Fred H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit for large
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit for large, do not expect to layer with heavy undergarment, a long sleeve sweater or sweat shirt is fitting, go with one size up if you like to wear heavy sweater underneath or you need more room in the gut area.
customer_reviews.author: vee99

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Small
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a Large and it seemed to be a size Medium-Large. We will be returning it and getting an Extra Large.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary S

customer_reviews.title: He's a construction worker so I felt it was a great idea for cold nights
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my boyfriend and he loves it. It keeps him warm. He's a construction worker so I felt it was a great idea for cold nights. A co-worker had to order one it such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: The jacket itself has served its purpose however after having it only a few months the zipper has broke and I am unable to zip it up any longer. When you are working in the cold you need to have your jacket zipped up and now it won't be a useful jacket.
customer_reviews.author: kimi

customer_reviews.title: Work clothes that are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this jacket, very comfortable and BRIGHT just what I need working night shift. You can always use new BRIGHT comfortable clothing. Thank You Phyllis
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: I love this coat
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite work coat. It is super warm and repels water well!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second order on these jackets. My husband and his crew really like them. I'm still not sure about the wash up how they do after being washed so many times.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: hello
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and three days later some of my zipper teeth came off. They were fast to give me a new one free and gave me a label for the returned jacket and since then the new one works fine. Was nice and easy to return and get a new one came in two days.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Sexton

customer_reviews.title: A lot better made and of better quality materials than i expected ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed! A lot better made and of better quality materials than i expected for the price! It's actually better than some jackets I've had that cost 5 times more! I'd definitely purchase another one of them if need arose
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent high visibilty and comfort
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this, it fits great and is very high visibility. He uses it for when he is towing cars. So far appears to be durable and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and warm and well made. My only complaint is the cuffs are really tight around your wrist. I wear it every day at work in brush and rain and it has held up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket and very warm
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket and very warm. The sleeves are really tight and I had to loosen them a little for comfort but otherwise it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: E. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket, just make sure you are aware this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket, just make sure you are aware this has a quilted lining. I had to buy a separate rain jacket that breathed a little more since I was so hot in this.
customer_reviews.author: Ian M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and so far (5 months) wears very well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice jacket,well made. My husband would wear it to bed if I let him
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket but something to be said for breathability
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket but something to be said for breathability. A very great jacket but off you sweat a lot, you will need to open it to breath.
customer_reviews.author: Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Rain jacket
customer_reviews.text: This waterproof rain coat is terrific. It keeps my husband dry which he is a truck driver so he is outside a lot. I would recommend this jacket to anyone. It was very affordable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: teresa cannon

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality jacket very comfortable and warm. Sizes are a little on the smaller side so I recommend you go one size bigger. Over all very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: great jacket. Only problem is it rides up my ...
customer_reviews.text: Warm, waterproof, great jacket. Only problem is it rides up my back as Im wirking but not that big if a deal. Runs a little small. I'm 6 foot 190lbs and i needed a 2xl
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT JACKET!  GREAT PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: Best rain jacket ever made! Warm, durable, HIGHLY reflective. Adheres to INDOT and ODOT visibility requirements.
customer_reviews.author: ESL Prof

customer_reviews.title: Very good jacket keep me warm and dry
customer_reviews.text: Very good jacket keep me warm and dry. Fits a little bit small. I'm mid... and a large fit me just right....
customer_reviews.author: Jventu

customer_reviews.title: Short sleeve
customer_reviews.text: The sleeves are too short for the comparable size. I got a large and if my arms are at my sides, the cuffs are an inch above my wrists.
customer_reviews.author: P.

customer_reviews.title: Good overall value.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good jacket for the money. I do wish it had knit cuff versus the coarse nylon material.
customer_reviews.author: charles r.

customer_reviews.title: Over all great but I had to return it for a larger ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a little too small. Over all great but I had to return it for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Nika Hezebicks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best rain jacket you'll ever buy. this is a professional coat!
customer_reviews.author: cabin creature

customer_reviews.title: We love the jacket very nice and bright but runs a ...
customer_reviews.text: We love the jacket very nice and bright but runs a little small so it’s best to order one size larger than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Ranee M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best Jacket I Ever Bought! Total Wind and Rain Breaker!!!! A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Setlock

customer_reviews.title: Works well in cool rainy
customer_reviews.text: heavier than I expected. Works well in cool rainy weather
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: This jacket is a superb value. It is everything ...
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is a superb value. It is everything the advertisement says it is. The only thing I'm not crazy about is how tight the wrist elastic is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wore this jacket for two yrs during winter all i ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore this jacket for two yrs during winter all i need was a sweater under it very warm hope it get me through this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order larger size.
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews before I ordered. Reviews are correct, this product needs to be ordered one size larger than what you need. Fits well and seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Farrier Kalich

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, but liner does not come out so it's a cold weather only item.
customer_reviews.author: tekn0lust

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good jacket but not enough insulation for really cold weather. Perfect for temps in the 40-50 deg range.
customer_reviews.author: alex grantham

customer_reviews.title: Nice, warm and dry during snow and rain days
customer_reviews.text: Nice, warm and dry during snow and rain days. The collar comes up high and tight which really keeps the wind and rain away from your neck. On the other hand, the cuffs are a bit tight with winter gloves and the front pockets are a bit small but that is just my opinion. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Arhit

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Super bright and nice price. Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Technician

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good work jacket, keeps warm and safe, a bit hard to clean the grease!
customer_reviews.author: Asal Naderi

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the price and it fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the price and it fit perfect . I would definitely recommend this jacket. also it is water proof .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a five star but the run small so what ever size you wear i would get it one size bigger
customer_reviews.author: john doe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is actually very warm! One of my favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Stasyszen

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and warm jacket! Sizes run small get the next size!
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy, constructed well and is true to the description ...
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves his jacket. It's very sturdy, constructed well and is true to the description provided. It will last in his rough, dirty and wet work environment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I returned this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this jacket because the elastic on the sleeves made them too tight to wear. Wish I had known that before ordering
customer_reviews.author: relenned

customer_reviews.title: This jacket is awesome,,
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews at all but. This jacket is awesome,,, and the price ,,, no brainer !!! Won't be disappointed !!!
customer_reviews.author: erick

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend loved this jacket and fit him perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved this jacket and fit him perfectly. Couldn't of asked for anything better and it came on time. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan tucker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My work jacket is amazing thank you very much that fit me right
customer_reviews.author: Edilzar Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: The wrists are a bit tight at first but they get more comfortable as you wear
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a jacket to use on the pipeline, this keeps me warm in the cold mornings, I normally have to take it off by noon or it makes me melt. Seems durable so far after 2 months, but the "stain/dirt resist" is a lie. Which really didn't matter to me. I just needed a waterproof jacket that was high vis and it exceeds all my expectations. The wrists are a bit tight at first but they get more comfortable as you wear them
customer_reviews.author: Tyrel L Herman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it.It's kinda right around the wrist but other then that I LOVE it
customer_reviews.author: Payton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine except for the stitching on the jacket
customer_reviews.author: Harold Milton

customer_reviews.title: great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket! My husband is 6'0, 185 and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Momma K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is very good jacket meets safety regulations, is warm and everybody like it.
customer_reviews.author: .Juan L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but arms run short
customer_reviews.text: Great durable but arms and length run small. Go with next size from your original size. Also very bright and reflective for safety.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Exactly what I was looking for. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Quality Hi-VIsibility Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Extremely fast shipping and product is better than described. Looks like it is well constructed and will take the wear and use of a construction site, or kept in the trunk for a breakdown crossing the Sierras. Better than those offered at a far higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald R. Fulghum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dock signal
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Price, Comfort, Plenty of pockets and mic belts Cons: Order a size larger Very happy with this jacket.. As others have mentioned it does run a little small.. I ordered a Large and I'm 5'9 165lbs and it fits snug.. If I was a little taller I would be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Great Jacket!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously Great Jacket!! 6'2 & 190/med. slim, the large size fits just a whisper snug, but 100% satisfied due to the thickness of the lining in coat/arms. Neck area does have soft material & looks to be well made. Would classify this as a "heavy"safety windbreaker for active type work. I do have long arms, but sleeves are not too short, cuffs/waist band are tight to keep wind/rain/snow out. IMO, with a couple layers added underneath will be warm enough in 20-30 degree temps in mild winds. Lost one star, due to missing Zipper!! WTH Its 98degrees outside so I can wait....again.
customer_reviews.author: crimzonrider

customer_reviews.title: Very nice jacket, heavier than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jacket, heavier than I expected. I thought it was going to be a shell, which I could pack in a hike or use as a wind breaker-light rain coat combination but it could easily be used in snow. And I live in Hawaii.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Koo

customer_reviews.title: Best money i spent all year
customer_reviews.text: Working at LAX airport i was using my person going out sweaters, and in the processes they would rip fade and etc. Best money i spent all year.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Super small jacket the size chart made it seem bigger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ORDER LARGER SIZE
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a terrible disappointment... I'm not joking when I say I felt like I was wearing a child's jacket. I'm a normal sized (Large) dude... I ordered the large, and I could see my belly button with my arms extended all the way out. Terrible design and build quality. I ended up buying another style of the same brand, and the LARGE fit fine. Go figure...
customer_reviews.author: Harry Ballsagna

product_meta.title: Tingley Rubber J26112 Bomber II Jacket, Large, Lime Green
product_meta.description: Color:Fluorescent Yellow-GreenTingley Rubber J26112 Bomber II Jacket, Large, Lime Green
feature_bullets: Ansi/Isea 107 Class 3 Compliant, 100% Waterproof, Jacket For High Visibility
Fluorescent Background Material For Excellent Daytime Visibility; 2" Silver Reflective Tape Reflects Light For 360Degree Nighttime Conspicuity
Quilted Polyester Lining Provides Warmth And Comfort; Complete Freedom Of Movement; Roll-A-Way Hood In Collar
Slash Front Pockets With Closure; Left Breast Radio Pocket With Flap Closure; Dark-Colored Front Helps Conceal Dirt
